statements.statement: SELECT /*+ 위상규::/gcb/batch/bwkSpt/excelEmlSndMg/excelEmlSndDatHisDelJob/ExcelEmlSndDatHisDel/retvExcelEmlSndDatHisNcn */ COUNT(1) 건수_N10 FROM INSTC.TBGCBUM02 A /* GCB_UMS엑셀이메일발송데이터내역 */ WHERE SUBSTR(A.이메일발송요청등록일시, 1, 8) < ${작업기준년월일}

DELETE /*+ 위상규::/gcb/batch/bwkSpt/excelEmlSndMg/excelEmlSndDatHisDelJob/ExcelEmlSndDatHisDel/delExcelEmlSndDatHis */ FROM INSTC.TBGCBUM02 /* GCB_UMS엑셀이메일발송데이터내역 */ WHERE SUBSTR(이메일발송요청등록일시, 1, 8) < ${작업기준년월일} AND ROWNUM <= 1000
